data.title: United Way of New York City
data.meta_description: Meet United Way of New York City's President and CEO, Grace C. Bonilla, the Executive Leadership Team, and the Board of Directors for the organization.
data.meta_site_name: United Way of New York City
data.text: Grace C. Bonillais the President and CEO of United Way of New York City. She previously held positions at Covenant House International and The Committee for Hispanic Children & Families and was appointed by Mayor Bill de Blasio as the first Executive Director of the Task force on Racial Equity and Inclusion during the COVID-19 pandemic. Grace holds a BA in Political Science from St. Johnâ€™s University and a JD from Brooklyn Law School. She has dedicated her career to shaping policies that alleviate inequitable challenges in New York City.
